metadata.title: CVE-2021-47315 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:memory: fsl_ifc: fix leak of IO mapping on probe failureOn probe error the driver should unmap the IO memory.  Smatch reports:  drivers/memory/fsl_ifc.c:298 fsl_ifc_ctrl_probe() warn:'fsl_ifc_ctrl_dev->gregs' not released on lines: 298.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
